title: Ticket #39: Collector should add authenticated client name into resource ad
description:
Upon receipt of a resource Class Ad, if the Collector can authenticate the advertising client, the Collector should insert the authenticated and mapped client name into the Class Ad itself.

More details in attached RUST ticket.
remarks:
2009-Jan-30 17:15:06 by zmiller:
code complete, tested, committed, and pushed.

2009-Feb-03 14:55:50 by zmiller:
sent igor a prerelease today. he tested it out and signed off on it with only the suggestion that the new attribute be named "AuthenticatedIdentity" instead of whatever i put there before.

2009-Mar-12 12:21:00 by zmiller:
committed a couple weeks ago using 'AuthenticatedIdentity' as the attribute name.
